short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collection of handy Text/XML/JSON/CSV tools and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you often need to process various formats of data in daily work, this extension is right for you. Just paste what you want to process, and click on corresponding function button, then wait for the result to come out. It is fast and effective! Also, undo/redo operations are available for more convenience use.

The extension currently has 50+ handy tools that cover a variety of data formats including XML, JSON and CSV etc. More tools will be added to it on a regular basis.
